name: awesome-editor
description: Stylet.css is an awesome modern CSS framework, designed in the aim of making responsive, beautiful and a website with awesome animations at ease. It is compactible for all browsers: Chrome. Firefox. Edge. IE. Safari. Opera. And also devices, Desktop, Laptop, Tablet, Mobile. Stylet does not require JS, and it is built with CSS.
author: Nnamchi Israel <nnamchiisrael@yahoo.com>
Apaxaa Studios
